column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday August 26 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR CLAYS MILL RD:
column4: Roadway shutdown between Stratford Dr and Cardinal Ln until further notice.  Power outage due to a downed electric wire.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR CLAYS MILL RD:
column4: Traffic signals remain dark on Clays Mill Rd at Pasadena Dr.

column5: Right and center lanes blocked until further notice.  Crews continue cleaning up a semi trailer fire.  Left lane remains open.
